content.p: Innovation and growth are the pillars to your productivity and profitability. Our sector-leading experts will help future-proof your business. Contract research allows an organisation to access the expertise of academics to improve its products or services. The company commissions the University to undertake the research on its behalf. Staff and academics at our University work as consultants for organisations in the public and private sectors. The provide expertise, skills and solutions to a broad range of challenges. Examples of consultancy types include: The world of work is evolving. And that means the skills needed to succeed in this new world are changing, too. We offer various training and bespoke courses, specifically designed to support you and your organisation throughout the learning experience. For more information, get in touch with our Research and Knowledge Exchange Hub.
